package com.basics;

public class Pentagon {
	public static double area_pentagon(int a,int s)
	{
		double area;
		
		return area=(2.5*s*a);
	}


	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		double area=area_pentagon(3,8);
		System.out.println("Area="+area);
		

	}

}
